marshmallowRoulette.title: Turn On Marshmallow Roulette
marshmallowRoulette.tooltip: Enables nut allergy, and puts a chance of nuts in your marshmallows.

rouletteChance.title: Marshmallow Roulette Riskiness
rouletteChance.tooltip: This is the chance of suffocating after eating a roulette marshmallow, calculated by 1/<value>. Default is 6.

alwaysPunish.title: Consuming Burnt Death
alwaysPunish.tooltip: Make it so that if you eat a burnt marshmallow you die.

instantPunish.title: Instant Death Upon Burning
instantPunish.tooltip: If you burn or overcook a marshmallow, you die instantly.

marshmallowLimitEnable.title: Marshmallow Limit Toggle
marshmallowLimitEnable.tooltip: Limit the number of marshmallows that you can use per loop. Unconsumed but cooked marshmallows will return to their original state.

marshmallowCount.title: Marshmallow Limit Count
marshmallowCount.tooltip: The number of marshmallows you have if you turn on the marshmallow limit. Will load changes after each loop.
